root: ^Good to see you out! How's the morning treating you?
^It's still early to tell. Hopefully nice as the day goes on.
^Having a better time than me looks like. Serena told me your taking over for Zara?
^The way Risa's been going I'd bet the birds and frogs are already talking.
^Don't worry about that though, I got something for you. To ask I mean.
^Wilma's clutch are all grown up now! Oh, they're adorable! Running about up to all sorts of trouble.
^One of my hens! The youngest! She had her chicks a bit ago, you should come see when you get the chance.
^It's a pain keeping them all in check. I've gotten older and can't get around like I used to.
^So yesterday I was thinking, "Gosh, there has to be a way to keep up with the little speed demons!."
^You want my help to keep the coop in check?
^No, better! Need a way to make myself faster! Just as fast as they are.
^I'll be here when you're finished! Can't wait!
^task:My Second Task $Asa $While those chickens do give her a hard time, I'm not sure if this would really help her.
